description: This is a technical school. Here I have learned a lot of things from mechanics, electronics and even programming. This is a great place to start because I fell in love with embedded programming from here. Here I learned about hardware, how to process signals and design an application according to the requirements from reality.

A E-tática é uma agência especializada em soluções para comércio eletrônico, marketing digital e identidade visual desde 2008, trabalhando com grandes, pequenos e médios negócios, oferecendo para seus clientes, o know-how na integração de seus negócios com Sistemas integrados de gestão empresarial (ERP) e APIs de terceiros, tais como provedores de pagamento personalizados, fazendo a integração do gerenciamento interno da plataforma on-line e da loja física, sendo certificada pelas principais plataformas do mercado.

Na E-tática , trabalhei para desenvolver soluções personalizadas para clientes do atacado e varejo, valorizando a qualidade e a continuidade dos projetos a médio e longo prazo.

Ban Vien Company Limited – are Trusted Technology Partner in Software Development & Embedded System development, have been providing full scope of IT services for 10+ years in Automotive (Chip Driver Development), Education (K-12 LMS Platform, Professional e-Training Platform), e-Commerce (Customer Development & Sales Development) for FMCG industry, Banking & Finance, Insurance.

Ban Vien provides Automotive Embedded Services to build solutions for global leaders in micro-controller, analogue, power and SoC products. With skilled professionals and decades of experience, we also provide end-to-end services with New Product Development, Product Enhancement, Sustenance, Testing and Verification.

At here I am in charge of the main job is integration, unit test and verify for automotive source. I have worked to develop the driver for IoT devices, check and detect errors.
